channel.title: Neil Maclennan on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Widening access to higher education for looked after young people
item.description: NM - Neil Maclennan JG - Jonathan Gray SM - Susan Mueller GC - Graham Connolly Learning Enhancement and Academic Development in supporting students from a looked after background, hosted by Neil Maclennan, Jonathan Gray, Susan Mueller and Graham Connolly This is Iriss.fm, internet radio for Scotland Social Services. On 25th January 2013, the Centre for Learning Enhancement and Academic Development at Glasgow Caledonian University, and CELCIS, the Centre for Excellent for Looked After Children in Scotland, joined forces to review progress in relation to supporting students from a looked after background.
